dialogue.text: Sheesh! That crowd went ballistic! I've never felt that kind of energy at a show before.
I... I can't even describe how amazing it was! I felt like I was floating on air!
I could've sworn you were! Something about that finale felt... I don't even know, man! It felt awesome!
And what a finale that was! Reviews are already pooling in, and they're through the roof!
The Sweet and Sour Summer Mix may darn well be the most successful show ever presented here at my showroom!
This little mixup worked out spectacularly in the end, hmm? Ahaha!
Ah, I think I'm a little lightheaded from all the excitement. Is there somewhere nearby where I may decompress?
You can try Lavender Park! It's just a quick jaunt up north from the showroom.
Hey, umm... you got room for one more? I could use the fresh air too.
I'd love for you to join me, Sour!
Hell yeah, let's roll.
A quick jaunt later...
This must be the place. My mind already feels so much clearer over here.
Same here, and now that my head is clear, damn... I feel real bad about snapping at you earlier. I'm sorry, Sweet.
Oh, don't worry yourself. I think we got off on the wrong foot when we first met. The stress of the mixup was getting to us on our big day.
Now is the perfect time to remedy things and properly introduce ourselves.
Yeah, I'm so down for that. I can already tell you're feeling a lot more comfortable now. You're speaking so... pristine and proper.
Do I really? Ahaha, as soon as I got here, I was told that I sounded 'old-fashioned.'
You and the others here definitely speak differently than how everyone does back in the Preheats.
Well, except Showman. He'd fit right in back home, aha!
Wait, the Preheats? Like... that place up in the mountains where a bunch of famous classical musicians live? The one across the whole damn ocean? THAT Preheats?
Mmhmm!
I should've guessed. Mama talks about that place a lot. Must've costed a fortune to get here.
It was very... VERY expensive.
I... I spent several paychecks worth of money on travel alone. Taking my father's tour bus across the ocean by boat was no easy feat... but I wanted to do this so badly.
Nah, I getcha. I would've done the same thing myself in your shoes. I'm glad this place is local for me, though. I live down in Enzync City, just a few miles thatta way.
I saw the city on my boat ride over! It looks absolutely gorgeous!
You gotta come swing by! I can show you all the best spots! Like the burger joint my cousin works at! Or that killer ramen shop down in Togarashi Town- oh! And maybe we could-
Ah, all of that sounds so lovely, but... I don't think I'll have the time.
Huh? Why not?
I could only afford to be here for so long. I need to catch my boat home tonight... and the chance of me affording another performance here is unlikely...
Damn... your time's that strict, huh?
Well, hey. Let's make the most of your remaining time here, ok?
Hmm?
Let's play another song together! Just us this time, no audience needed.
(Oh my, he's so determined-!)
